## 1. Description

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## 2. Priority

- [ ] Critical (Blocker)
- [ ] High (Major feature failure)
- [ ] Medium (Minor issue)
- [ ] Low (Cosmetic/Trivial)

## 3. Reproduction Steps

Please link to a minimal reproduction (see
[`workflow-bug-reporting`](../../.agent/workflows/Global/workflow-bug-reporting.md)
and [`workflow-bug-fix`](../../.agent/workflows/Global/workflow-bug-fix.md)) or list steps:

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## 4. Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## 4.1 Acceptance Criteria (GWT) (Recommended)

- **Given** [Precondition]
- **When** [Action]
- **Then** [Expected Result]

## 5. Environment

- **OS**: [e.g. Windows]
- **Browser**: [e.g. Chrome, Safari]
- **Version**: [e.g. 22]

Paste logs here
